name: Otome Legends
description:
Your friend recommends you to play a dating sim that she's been obsessed with lately. After playing it, you reflect on your life and realize that you wish you could live your life as the main heroine of a dating sim. The next day when you tell your friend at school about the game, she comes up with a mischievous plan to turn you into a real life otome heroine and things go terribly wrong.


Each route takes 1.5-2 hours to complete.
There are 4 routes (plus a secret route) making it 5 routes in total.

Description of gameplay:
You don't have a choice.

TRIGGER WARNING:
This game contains themes of suicide and depression, graphic imagery of blood and gore, and themes of violence. Please play at your own risk.


SPOILER WARNING: (ONLY READ IF YOU ARE STUCK IN A PUZZLE NEAR THE END OF THE GAME)

Hint: If you are stuck in the game and you really want to, just poke him in the eyes and the game will close. You won't win but it will close the window.
